application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Erection of single storey rear and side infill  extension
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-ab27d189-7fff-caf0-02a8-d604ed638015"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The proposed extension, by virtue of its design, bulk, height, siting and projection, would result in an unacceptable loss of daylight, would result in a loss of outlook and have an overbearing impact on the occupants of neighbouring no. 82 Forburg Road, to the detriment of the amenities of neighbouring occupants. </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre-wrap;">As such the proposed development is contrary to policies </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre-wrap;">LP1 (Design quality and local character), LP2 (Development and Amenity), LP3 (</span><span id="docs-internal-guid-d36bb247-7fff-cf59-a743-0b6d33101f17"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">Designated heritage assets</span>) </span></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre-wrap;">of the LP33 Hackney Local Plan 2020; and D4 Delivering good design of the London Plan 2021 and Hackney Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD.</span></p><div><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-5996a2e2-7fff-9926-1b3a-c7b1ff2211a0"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The proposed rear extension, by reason of its design, size, rear projection, and position, would be visually obtrusive</span></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap;"><span style="font-size: 14px;"> and out of character with the host property and would fail to preserve or enhance the character and appearance of Northwold</span> <span style="font-size: 14px;">&amp; Cazenove Conservation Area.</span> </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;">As such the proposed development is contrary to policies </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;">LP1 (Design quality and local character), LP3 (</span><span id="docs-internal-guid-d36bb247-7fff-cf59-a743-0b6d33101f17"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">Designated heritage assets</span>) </span></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;">of the LP33 Hackney Local Plan 2020; and D4 Delivering good design of the London Plan 2021 and Hackney Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD.</span></p>
